input: Which one of the following pairs is not correctly matched?

options.B: The forms of oaths or : Second Schedule affirmations
options.C: Allocation of seats in the : Fourth Schedule Council of States
options.D: Provisions as to : Tenth Schedule disqualification on the ground of defection

explanation: Forms of Oaths and Affirmations are the subject of Third Schedule. Salary of President, Governors, Chief Judges, Judges of High Court and Supreme Court, Comptroller and Auditor General are the subject of Second Schedule.
